mapper.select: SELECT * FROM baskets b LEFT JOIN coupons c ON c.coup_id = b.bask_coupon_id LEFT JOIN users u ON u.user_id = b.bask_user_id LEFT JOIN bank_cards bc ON bc.bc_number = b.bask_bank_cards_number LEFT JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = u.user_role_id LEFT JOIN baskets_and_variations ON bav bav.baskets_id = b.bask_id LEFT JOIN variations v ON v.var_id = bav.variations_id WHERE b.coup_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO baskets(bask_totalPrice, bask_date_created, bask_date_modified, bask_coupon_id, bask_user_id, bask_bank_cards_number, bask_price_books_id) VALUES(#{totalPrice}, #{created}, #{modified}, ${coupon.getId()}, ${user.getId()}, ${"'"+bankCard.getNumber()+"'"}, ${priceBook.getId()})
